DOC.brief_summary: The investigators designed a double-blind, randomized placebo-controlled study to determine the effects of dexmedetomidine on the recovery characteristics of patients who were scheduled to undergo endovascular coil embolization.
DOC.brief_title: A Better Choice for Patients Undergoing Endovascular Coil Embolization
DOC.criteria: 1865 years old ASA I or ASA II patients undergoing ECE treatment for intracranial aneurysms were included. Patients were excluded based on the following parameters: older than 65 yrs, a history of mental illness, recent use of sedatives or analgesics and with sensation.
